items.title: 'They just kept killing': Eyewitnesses describe deadly crackdown in Iran
items.description: The BBC has received eyewitness accounts of security forces attacking anti-government protesters across the country.

items.title: 'Miracle baby' born in a tree above Mozambique floodwaters dies aged 25
items.description: Rosita Salvador Mabuiango's mother was sheltering for days before giving birth perched above the water.

items.title: Former Fed chairs condemn criminal investigation into Jerome Powell
items.description: Three former heads of the central bank say the probe seeks to undermine the Fed's independence and "has no place" in the US.

items.title: Mortuary videos show how deadly Iran crackdown has become
items.description: BBC Verify has been examining disturbing footage from a mortuary in Tehran, showing scores of bodies. These images could hold clues about whatâ€™s happe...

items.title: What we know about Iran's protests and the crackdown
items.description: The BBC's diplomatic correspondent, Caroline Hawley, looks into the latest events unfolding in Iran.
